description.plain: Mazie (aka Grace Christian) is an electronic inspired bedroom pop artist. She cites Gwen Stefani as one of her inspirations. She released her debut single “no friends” in April 2020.

body.plain: Mazie (aka Grace Christian) is an electronic inspired bedroom pop artist. She cites Gwen Stefani as one of her inspirations. She released her debut single “no friends” in April 2020.

songs.title: ​dumb dumb

description.plain: Her first single of 2021 after reaching virality during the COVID-19 pandemic, dumb dumb is a song “about misinformation, gullibility and incredulity;” that mazie wrote a day after the insurrection at the Capitol, according to The New York Times.

songs.embed_content: Read “​dumb dumb” by ​mazie on Genius

songs.title: ​no friends

description.plain: “No Friends” is Mazie’s debut single. It focuses on how being at college has made her feel more alone, it’s upbeat tune but sad lyrics almost making fun of her ordeal.

songs.embed_content: Read “​no friends” by ​mazie on Genius

body.plain: “No Friends” is Mazie’s debut single. It focuses on how being at college has made her feel more alone, it’s upbeat tune but sad lyrics almost making fun of her ordeal.

songs.lyrics:
9 Contributors​no friends Lyrics[Chorus]
I don't have no fuckin' friends
I don't care, I'm not upset
I admit that I'm a mess
I don't have no fuckin' friends
Don't have fun, I don't make plans
I don't have no fuckin' friends

[Verse 1]
If less is more, then I'm doing the most
I'm so bored and I feel like a ghost
I don't wanna smoke
No more 'cause I'm broke
And my window won't open
God, my life is a joke

[Verse 2]
But then I wake up and I do it again
But then I'm livin' life and I don't have any friends
Like I said in the chorus
My life is so boring
And so unimportant
Guess I'll call my mom again, 'cause

[Chorus]
I don't have no fuckin' friends
I don't care, I'm not upset
I admit that I'm a mess
I don't have no fuckin' friends
Don't have fun, I don't make plans
I don't have no fuckin' friends
You might also like[Outro]
I don't wanna be alone
I don't wanna be alone6Embed

songs.lyrics:
7 Contributors​i think i wanna be alone Lyrics[Chorus]
I think I wanna be alone
'Cause love makes me uncomfortable
My God, it's fucking terrible
Goodbyes are so unbearable
I think I wanna be alone
Can't even open up my phone
The world is fucking terrible
I think I wanna be alone

[Verse 1]
Remember to forget me at home
'Cause I'm manic pixie dreaming about being alone, yeah
You can't save this side of me
So don't say hi to me

[Verse 2]
I sleep better in the dark
Lights out, it's no walk in the park
I don't need therapy
I'm always there for me in the end

[Pre-Chorus]
Doo-doo-doo-doo-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo

[Chorus]
I think I wanna be alone
'Cause love makes me uncomfortable
My God, it's fucking terrible
Goodbyes are so unbearable
I think I wanna be alone
Can't even open up my phone
The world is fucking terrible
I think I wanna be aloneYou might also like2Embed
